titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out demonstration projects related to providing care for veterans in rural areas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 7/21/2009--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to carry out demonstration projects to examine alternatives for expanding care for veterans in rural areas. Requires a report on such projects.
